issue.title: Installation does not to set the infrastrcture ID
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We have to reports of *infrastructure ID* missing after a full install:
https://forge.easysdi.org/boards/34/topics/599
https://forge.easysdi.org/boards/34/topics/653

CATALOG cannot work without it!

We need an urgent install check.


**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Confirmed on a fresh install

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

com_easysdi_shopInstallerScript::setParams was buggy
